name: HeroSquare
description:
⬜What does it mean to be a hero?

Start on an epic adventure of square proportions! Make your way through mysterious zones, solve puzzles and fight tough enemies along the way!

You will find powerful items that grant you abilities required to continue your journey into the strange world of ⬜HeroSquare.

The most fortunate adventurers will also find hidden treasure, reserved only for the most throughout explorers!

  ⬜ the missing metroidvania for 1982

  ⬜ thrilling combat with tight parries and flying bullets

  ⬜ explore everywhere for secrets!

  ⬜ original soundtrack with FM growls and singing chips

In development, download the demo today!
